title: KAKIVENST
desc:
Kakamega County Investment and Development Agency was created through an
Act of the County Assembly of Kakamega, known as The Kakamega County
Investment and Development Agency Act, 2018 which was to provide for the
establishment of a legal and institutional framework for promotion and co-ordination
of investment by the county government of Kakamega. This will provide a way for
investment decisions to be made as quick as possible
